review: I like the voice activation feature on this Fire device, responds very quickly and is extremely easy to use. The way I get the most programming options is to search on Amazon.com and add to your watch list. My disappointment is that even as a Prime member  there are many movies  available to you at a fee, although they have been out for sometime on network TV, cable, internet etc. Be aware of the advertising before you join.
